basnahira palatha (uthura) bhara niyojya polispathi kapila jayasekara ha gampaha kottasa bhara jyeshta polis adhikari muditha pussalla mahathwarunge upades matha pradeshaya bhara sahakara polis adhikari (1) shri lal perera saha mulasthana pradhana polis parikshaka bhadraji da esn kalinga yana mahathawarunge adhikshanayen lama ha kantha karyanshaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshika pradipa nilanthi saha aparadha wimarshana anshaye upa polis parikshaka nirosh dilruk ha sarayan sarath (9265) yana niladharihu parikshana pawathwuha.
